From time to time the Council may need to gain access to your home to undertake surveys. This could be for a number of reasons: -

  • prior to major repairs being undertaken
  • to update Council records on the condition of its stock
  • to carry out specialist surveys, for example to identify the presence of asbestos containing materials etc.

Should the Council need to gain access to your property to undertake survey work the surveyor will carry identification or should have a pre-arranged appointment. Do not allow any person into your home if they do not carry the relevant identification. If you are in any doubt please contact us using the details above:-
